name: Hatenia - V 0.0.1 - English Version
description:
In this story, BuWind cannot acquire any power in Hatena village.

So he had an idea that changed his life forever: Stealing a power. Because of this, he is wanted by a brigade called "BAD", the first letters of "Brigade Anti Délit". He has to face various lieutenants in order to solve Hatena's problem, and defeat King Kevin.

This game is still in development (it only contains cinematics, not much gameplay). It will be a full game!

The game lasts about 50 minutes, maybe 1 hour if you take the time to enjoy the story.

There is not much fighting.

Be careful, because some musics are copyrighted 

Requires Windows to play.

Don't hesitate to give your opinion on this game, it's what will allow me to progress.

Translation in english : 40%
